ygData.subject: New Guild Chapters, and a Rainbow Festival
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, For those of you who have volunteered to be the guild leader for Mystical Alliance on the other servers (other than Brell Serilis) I need some
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

For those of you who have volunteered to be the guild leader for Mystical
Alliance on the other servers (other than Brell Serilis) I need some information
from you. On many of the servers, I do not have a character yet, so the easiest
thing is for me to create a new character in a starting city this is convenient
to where you are located. So, send me the following information:

Name of guild leader character:
Nearest starting city:

In order for me to make you guild leader, I have to be in the same zone as you.
I don't think we even have to be logged on at the same time, but I am not sure.
Verant has changed the way guilds are set up by the GM's. I am under the
understanding that I can petition a GM any time during regular customer service
hours. So, as I receive the above info from you, I will begin getting this done.
After you give me the information, you may wish to 'park' your character in this
city so I can go ahead and assign you as the leader.

I hope to begin working on our web site soon. I will keep you posted.

RAINBOW FESTIVAL
Also, Christina (who has been leveling her Luna character quite nicely I might
add) suggested that we have some sort of guild meeting in Norrath on one of the
servers. A chance to get together and chat. I am working on finding a time for
this and will let you know. It will probably be this Saturday, the 28th. We will
meet on Brell Serilis and probably in the Freeport area as it is centrally
located. If you don't have a character on Brell, you can just create a newbie
character so you can meet with everyone. If you have a character, but need help
traveling, let me know and we can arrange escorts beforehand.

After the get together, those who want to can do some hunting together. We can
break up into hunting groups based on levels. I will provide binds and corpse
locating for anyone who needs it. Also, I may have some mino axes for some
hunters to borrow (but I will need them back after the hunt. Gotta get money to
buy my spells :) It might be fun to see a bunch of level 1 melee types with mino
axes, hehe.

Anyone else have any ideas for other fun things we can do during our festival,
please post to the list.

David

Dedric, gnome necromancer (12 level)
Guild Leader, Mystical Alliance,
Brell Serilis Chapter
